text: Roger d'Amécourt is a French writer and publisher.Académie française == Selected works == *1987: Le Mariage de mademoiselle de La Verne : les avatars de la vertu, Prix Ève Delacroix 1988. == References== == External links == * Le mariage de Mademoiselle de La Verne : les avatars de la vertu on Library thing Category:20th-century French non-fiction writers Category:20th-century French male writers Category:French publishers (people) Category:Possibly living people
